text: On 29 July 2021, the oil tanker Mercer Street was attacked off the coast of Oman. Deadly drone attack on tanker escalates Iran-Israel maritime tensions The United States Navy said the attack came from a drone. Israeli, United States and European officials blamed the attack on Iran. Iranian state media initially said the attack was in response to a possible Israeli airstrike on a military airport in Syria, but the Iranian government formally denied involvement.Iran TV report says attack on “Israeli ship” was revenge for Syria raid Similar incidents occurred in May 2019, June 2019 and August 2021. ==References== Category:2021 in Iran Category:2020s disasters in Iran Category:July 2021 events Category:2020s in Oman Category:Maritime disasters Category:2021 disasters in Asia
title: July 2021 Gulf of Oman incident
